Text: Not sure what's up with this torrent..keep getting an error when trying to download..Could you just upload The Rocket Summer album on it's own? that's all I really want.

Thank you so much, you are the very reason why I don't listen to secular music any more because now my christian music library is overflowing!

Please if you could find anything by Will Reagan and United Pursuit it would be greatly appreciated.

iDivine, you're too kind.  But we'll give that glory and credit to God, were it rightfully belongs.  :)

That being said, I had 5 releases for "United Pursuit Band" which I've torrented for you just now.  And I didn't have anything for "Will Reagan" other than his collaboration on one of those United Pursuit Band releases.

Hey! I have been following you for quite some time and appreciate all the effort that you put in. Some bands that I have been searching for is PAX217, Liang, Lust Control, Cayerio, Unshaken, and Midnight Orchestra (supposed to be christian) if you have anything of them, much obliged :D BTW they are all rock in terms
